Curly Form.desc: This is a small dragon Pokémon. It lives inside the mouth of Dondozo to protect itself from enemies on the outside.
Tatsugiri is an extremely cunning Pokémon. It feigns weakness to lure in prey, then orders its partner to attack.

Droopy Form.desc: This species’ differing colors and patterns are apparently the result of Tatsugiri changing itself to suit the preferences of the prey it lures in.
This Pokémon tricks its opponents by playing dead. It is small and weak, but it uses its smarts to survive.

Stretchy Form.desc: Bird Pokémon are its main prey. This Pokémon knows it’s weak, so it hunts with a partner.
It’s one of the most intelligent dragon Pokémon. It camouflages itself by inflating its throat sac.
